channel.title: Adding requirements to weapons/armour
channel.description: I really need this and cant find any tuts anywhere, if someone would please help me out, i need to add a pk point requirement to weapons. So like if you wanted to use bandos, you would have to have 200 pk points to wear it.

item.title: Adding requirements to weapons/armour
item.dc:creator: @2_drag_claws 2 drag claws
item.description:
@2_drag_claws wrote:

I really need this and cant find any tuts anywhere, if someone would please help me out, i need to add a pk point requirement to weapons. So like if you wanted to use bandos, you would have to have 200 pk points to wear it.

Read full topic
